languages.text: "Ты держал в страхе весь Футфол, это серьезное достижение. Такие люди могут быть мне полезны. Так что давай поговорим. Я предпочитаю рационально использовать людские ресурсы, а не стрелять с порога".

"You've ruled over all of Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."
languages.original_text: "Ты держал в страхе весь Футфол, это серьезное достижение. Такие люди могут быть мне полезны. Так что давай поговорим. Я предпочитаю рационально использовать людские ресурсы, а не стрелять с порога".

traits.locale_text: "You've ruled over the entire Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."

"You've ruled over the entire Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."

"You've ruled over all of Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."

"You've ruled over all of Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."

"You've ruled over all of Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."

languages.text: “你靠着恐惧统治了整个落脚港，这是相当了不起的成就。我可以让这样的人为我服务。咱们来谈谈吧，我喜欢合理地利用人力资源，不喜欢靠枪炮解决所有问题。”
languages.original_text: "You've ruled over all of Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."

traits.locale_text: “你靠着恐惧统治了整个落脚港，这是相当了不起的成就。我可以让这样的人为我服务。咱们来谈谈吧，我喜欢合理地利用人力资源，不喜欢靠枪炮解决所有问题。”

languages.text: «Ha logrado conquistar Paso con el miedo. Es una hazaña considerable. Me vendría bien alguien así. Hablemos, prefiero usar los recursos humanos de forma racional en vez de liarme a tiros».
languages.original_text: "You've ruled over all of Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."

traits.locale_text: «Ha logrado conquistar Paso con el miedo. Es una hazaña considerable. Me vendría bien alguien así. Hablemos, prefiero usar los recursos humanos de forma racional en vez de liarme a tiros».

languages.text: 「お前はフットフォールを恐怖で支配してきた。それはとんでもない功績だ。そんな相手とならできることもある。だから話をしよう…人の力を合理的に使う方が、銃をぶっ放して突撃するよりずっといい」
languages.original_text: "You've ruled over all of Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."

traits.locale_text: 「お前はフットフォールを恐怖で支配してきた。それはとんでもない功績だ。そんな相手とならできることもある。だから話をしよう…人の力を合理的に使う方が、銃をぶっ放して突撃するよりずっといい」

languages.text: "Ihr habt ganz Footfall mit Angst unter Eure Kontrolle gebracht. Das ist eine bemerkenswerte Leistung. Ich könnte solche Leute gebrauchen. Wir sollten reden – ich setze menschliche Ressourcen lieber vernünftig ein, als aus allen Rohren auf sie zu feuern."
languages.original_text: "You've ruled over all of Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt ganz Footfall mit Angst unter Eure Kontrolle gebracht. Das ist eine bemerkenswerte Leistung. Ich könnte solche Leute gebrauchen. Wir sollten reden – ich setze menschliche Ressourcen lieber vernünftig ein, als aus allen Rohren auf sie zu feuern."

languages.text: « Vous régnez sur Castel par la crainte. C'est un bel exploit. J'aurais grand besoin de gens comme vous, alors discutons. Je préfère utiliser les ressources humaines de façon rationnelle, plutôt que de foncer dans le tas. »
languages.original_text: "You've ruled over all of Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."

traits.locale_text: « Vous régnez sur Castel par la crainte. C'est un bel exploit. J'aurais grand besoin de gens comme vous, alors discutons. Je préfère utiliser les ressources humaines de façon rationnelle, plutôt que de foncer dans le tas. »

languages.text: "Binliman'ı korkuyla idare ediyorsunuz. Takdire şayan bir başarı bence. Böylelerini severim. Hadi konuşalım, silahla dan dun dalmaktansa insan kaynaklarını mantıklı kullanmak hep tercihimdir."
languages.original_text: "You've ruled over all of Footfall with fear. That is a serious achievement. I could do with people like that. So let's talk — I prefer to use human resources rationally rather than charge in with guns blazing."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'ı korkuyla yönetiyorsun, takdire şayan bir başarı. Böyle insanları severim. Öyleyse konuşalım, olaya silahla dalmaktansa insan kaynaklarını mantıklı kullanmayı tercih ederim."
